snippet.title: Asterix & Obelix: Heroes - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
The year is 50 BC. Gaul is entirely occupied by the Romans. Well, not entirely... One small village of indomitable Gauls still holds out against the invaders.

Original gameplay combining deck building and turn-based combat. 24 heroes from the comic series available for you in this original adventure. To foil Caesar's plans, upgrade your deck and make the right tactical decisions!

Asterix & Obelix: Heroes (C) Nacon
ASTERIX® - OBELIX® - IDEFIX® / ©2023 LES ÉDITIONS ALBERT RENÉ / GOSCINNY - UDERZO
Developed by Gamexcite
Also released on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch

#theforeseenarcade #gaming #videogame #games #steam #nacon #asterix #obelix #asterixobelix #astérix #asterixandobelix #asterixandobelixheroes #gamexcite

FUN FACT: Unlike the previous Steam releases based on Asterix & Obelix, this game was not published by Microids this time. Not sure why, but given the mostly negative reception to OSome Studio's "Asterix & Obelix XXXL: The Ram of Hibernia", which Microids published, maybe that might have to do with it...
